statement.p: A native wolf species has been reintroduced into a national forest. Originally 500 wolves were transplanted, and after 3 years the population had grown to 644 wolves. If the population grows exponentially according to the formula \displaystyle{P}_{{t}}={P}_{{{0}}}{\left({1}+{r}\right)}^{{t}}
(a) Find the growth rate. Round your answer to the nearest tenth of a percent.
(b) If this trend continues, how many wolves will there be in ten years?
(c) If this trend continues, how long will it take for the population to grow to 1000 wolves? Round your answer to the nearest tenth of a year.
